## Search Filters

```{ojs}
viewof hardnessRange = Inputs.range([1, 10], {
  label: "Hardness (Mohs scale)",
  value: [1, 10],
  step: 0.5
})
```

```{ojs}
viewof selectedColors = Inputs.checkbox(
  ["colorless", "white", "black", "gray", "red", "blue", "green", "yellow", "purple", "brown", "pink", "orange"],
  {
    label: "Observed Colors (select any that match)",
    value: []
  }
)
```

```{ojs}
viewof selectedLuster = Inputs.select(
  ["any", "metallic", "vitreous", "pearly", "dull"],
  {
    label: "Luster",
    value: "any"
  }
)
```

```{ojs}
viewof selectedStreak = Inputs.select(
  ["any", "white", "black", "red", "greenish-black", "reddish-brown"],
  {
    label: "Streak Color",
    value: "any"
  }
)
```

```{ojs}
viewof specificGravityRange = Inputs.range([1, 8], {
  label: "Specific Gravity",
  value: [1, 8],
  step: 0.1
})
```

## Filtered Results

```{ojs}
filteredMinerals = minerals.filter(mineral => {
  // Check hardness range
  const hardnessMatch = mineral.hardness[1] >= hardnessRange[0] && mineral.hardness[0] <= hardnessRange[1];
  
  // Check specific gravity range
  const sgMatch = mineral.specific_gravity[1] >= specificGravityRange[0] && mineral.specific_gravity[0] <= specificGravityRange[1];
  
  // Check color match (if any colors selected)
  const colorMatch = selectedColors.length === 0 || 
    selectedColors.some(color => mineral.colors.includes(color));
  
  // Check luster match
  const lusterMatch = selectedLuster === "any" || mineral.luster.includes(selectedLuster);
  
  // Check streak match
  const streakMatch = selectedStreak === "any" || mineral.streak.includes(selectedStreak);
  
  return hardnessMatch && sgMatch && colorMatch && lusterMatch && streakMatch;
})
```

```{ojs}
html`<div style="margin: 20px 0;">
  <strong>Found ${filteredMinerals.length} matching mineral${filteredMinerals.length !== 1 ? 's' : ''}:</strong>
</div>`
```

```{ojs}
// Display results in a nice table format
Inputs.table(filteredMinerals, {
  columns: [
    "name",
    "formula", 
    "hardness",
    "specific_gravity",
    "colors",
    "streak",
    "luster",
    "crystal_system"
  ],
  header: {
    name: "Mineral",
    formula: "Formula",
    hardness: "Hardness",
    specific_gravity: "Specific Gravity",
    colors: "Colors",
    streak: "Streak",
    luster: "Luster",
    crystal_system: "Crystal System"
  },
  format: {
    hardness: d => d[0] === d[1] ? d[0].toString() : `${d[0]} - ${d[1]}`,
    specific_gravity: d => d[0] === d[1] ? d[0].toString() : `${d[0]} - ${d[1]}`,
    colors: d => d.join(", ")
  },
  width: {
    name: 120,
    formula: 100,
    colors: 200
  }
})
```

Click on a mineral name below to see full details:

```{ojs}
viewof selectedMineral = Inputs.select(
  ["Select a mineral..."].concat(filteredMinerals.map(m => m.name)),
  {label: "View detailed properties:", value: "Select a mineral..."}
)
```

```{ojs}
{
  if (selectedMineral !== "Select a mineral...") {
    const mineral = minerals.find(m => m.name === selectedMineral);
```
